Source.Name: talloc
Source.Summary: Talloc is a hierarchical, reference counted memory pool system with destructors
Source.Description:
Talloc is a hierarchical, reference counted memory pool system with destructors.
It is the core memory allocator used in Samba.

Package.Name: talloc
Package.Summary: Talloc is a hierarchical, reference counted memory pool system with destructors
Package.Description:
Talloc is a hierarchical, reference counted memory pool system with destructors.
It is the core memory allocator used in Samba.
